body: Is this ever supposed to be used outside of the library? If no, can we put it in a `detail` namespace? Otherwise it might end up being confusing for people
body_html: Is this ever supposed to be used outside of the library? If no, can we put it in a detail namespace? Otherwise it might end up being confusing for people
body_text: Is this ever supposed to be used outside of the library? If no, can we put it in a detail namespace? Otherwise it might end up being confusing for people
